refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: SystemStudio uses an optional configuration file systemstudio.conf located at /etc/systemstudio/. The location of this file can be overridden using the -c or --config SystemStudio command line option. The default SystemStudio installation does not include a systemstudio.conf file.

listitem.para: Specifies a directory PATH in which one or more SystemStudio modules can be found. The default is the system path. Multiple path elements are allowed. This element corresponds to the --lib-path command-line option.

Specifies the directory and filename PATH to which SystemStudio writes logging information. The default path is /var/log/systemstudio.log. SystemStudio creates the log file if none exists. This element corresponds to the --log-file command-line option.

Specifies a directory PATH in which one or more of SystemStudio's shared files can be found; the directory contains a hierarchy enabling SystemStudio to extract files for schemas, *.rng, fonts and images. The default path is /usr/share/systemstudio. Multiple path elements are allowed. This element corresponds to the --share-path command-line option .

Specifies a boolean value which enables or disables debug mode in SystemStudio. Enabling debug mode causes exception tracebacks, which are normally visible only in the log file, to be additionally displayed on the command line.

refsect1.title: CACHE ELEMENTS
refsect1.para: SystemStudio caches data across sessions for improved performance. The cache element allows specifying cache-related options.

listitem.para: The path child element specifies where SystemStudio stores both shared and per system cache data. The default is /var/cache/systemstudio.

The max-size child element specifies the maximum size for the shared cache located at CACHEDIR/.cache. The shared cache contains a copy of all files downloaded by SystemStudio. There is no human-readable form of the shared cache. The default size is 30GB. The recommended minimum size is 5GB. The default suffix is GB; other common suffixes are MB, GiB and TB.
SystemStudio deletes files from the shared cache on a least-recently used basis.

refsect1.title: VARIABLES
refsect1.para: SystemStudio element values, where indicated, use the variables below.

listitem.para: BOOLEAN is one of the following values: Yes, yes, True, true, On, on, 1, No, no, False, false, Off, off, 0.
CACHEDIR is the directory location where SystemStudio stores shared and per-system cache data.
PATH is the local absolute and relative file paths that SystemStudio supports. SystemStudio resolves relative paths from the current working directory.
TEXT is a string value. The description of each element explains that element's expected values or acceptable variations.
